title: Google Sheets Performance
description: Fix slow loading, freezing, and calculation errors in Google Sheets.

steps.title: Turn Off Hardware Acceleration
steps.instruction: Chrome Settings → System → Disable 'Use hardware acceleration when available'. This often fixes lagging in large spreadsheets.

steps.title: Remove Unnecessary Formulas
steps.instruction: Simplify complex ARRAYFORMULAs or VLOOKUPs that span entire columns. Large datasets calculate much faster with limited ranges.

steps.title: Enable Offline Access
steps.instruction: In Google Drive Settings, enable 'Offline' mode. This allows Sheets to keep working during minor internet flickers.

steps.title: Copy to New Spreadsheet
steps.instruction: If a specific file is extremely slow, File → Make a copy. This often cleans up hidden version history bloat.

steps.title: Check for Large Styles/Formatting
steps.instruction: Select unused rows/columns and Delete them. Conditional formatting over thousands of cells can cause severe lag.
